The Story of A Fierce Bad Rabbit
Image of the Fierce Bad Rabbit Image of Text
THIS is a fierce bad Rabbit; look at his savage whiskers, and his claws, and his turned-up tail.
Image of the good rabbit gnawing on a carrot and sitting on a bench. The fierce bad rabbit is coming up behind him. Image of Text
THIS is a nice gentle Rabbit. His mother has given him a carrot.
Image fierce bad rabbit taking the carrot from the nice good rabbit. Image of Text
THE bad Rabbit would like some carrot.
Image of Fierce Bad Rabbit taking the carrot and pushing the nice good rabbit off of the bench with his paw. Image of Text
HE doesn't say "Please.'' He takes it!
Image of the Fierce Bad Rabbit biting and clawing the nice good rabbit. Image of Text
AND he scratches the good Rabbit very badly.
Image of nice good rabbit huddled under a tree and the Fierce Bad Rabbit is in the background eating the carrot on the bench. Image of Text
THE good Rabbit creeps away, and hides in a hole. It feels sad.
Image of the great white hunter with gun, satchel, and a red nose. Image of Text
THIS is a man with a gun.
Image of hunter as he sees the fierce bad rabbit sitting on the bench eating his carrot. The hunter lowers his gun to fire! Image of Text
HE sees something sitting on a bench. He thinks it is a very funny bird!
Image of the Fierce Bad Rabbit eating his carrot and not suspecting the mighty hunter at all! Image of Text
HE comes creeping up behind the trees.
Image hunter shooting at the Fierce Bad Rabbit and a whirl of gunsmoke infuses the air around the barrel. Image of Text
AND then he shoots— BANG!
In a tornado of chaos, rabbit ears, the rabbit's tail and the carrot are strewn about. Image of Text
THIS is what happens—
The hunter runs upon the bench only to find the Fierce Bad Rabbit's Tail and carrot. Image of Text
BUT this is all he finds on the bench, when he rushes up with his gun.
Image of the nice good rabbit coming out from under the tree hole. The hunter is in the background. (Image Missing)
The good Rabbit peeps out of its hole . . .
Image of the Fierce Bad Rabbit running without his tail!!! Image of Text
AND it sees the bad Rabbit tearing past—without any tail or whiskers!
